attributes.action: start a entrepeneurship grant for under 18's throughout the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the lack of funding channels for under 18 year old's wanting to be entrepeneurs i would like to see the government step in and give us a hand. there are a lot of 16-17 year olds who want to get into entrepeneurship and are not able to get the princes trust award or similar awards and are left the option to just give up.
